text:
Lana J. Marks (born November 18, 1953) is a South African-born American handbag designer. She founded the fashion brand Lana Marks.
She is the current United States Ambassador to South Africa for the Donald Trump administration. She became the ambassador on January 28, 2020.
In September 2020, it was reported that Iran is planning an assassination plot against Marks because of the U.S. involvement in the death of Qasem Soleimani.

annotations.surface_form: United States Ambassador to South Africa
